txt.en: The house is completely still and silent...
DNT
Still no response...
No response...
DNT
At first glance, Clotild doesn't seem to be home.\n\nYou should try knocking on her door.
DNT

'Ah, hello! Might I ask, are you headed to Gamwich? My friend Clotild hasn't shown up for our weekly tea, and I'm growing quite worried. She's never missed one before, not once!\n\n'I'm afraid I can't step away now; I'm preparing our food so it'll be warm once she arrives. Please, make sure she's all right! Checking her home might be a good start; she lives just across from the inn there.'
DNT
It's possible Clotild didn't hear you knocking.\n\nYou should try again.
Delayed Response
You should wait to see if Clotild will answer the door.
You should wait to see if Clotild will answer the door.
Knock on Clotild's door
Someone is home -- most likely Clotild.\n\nYou should try to talk to her through the door.
Well... third time's the charm?
Wait for Clotild to answer the door
'Oh! I'm sorry for being so rude -- I thought you were one of my horrible neighbours. I hear them knocking on my front door at all hours of the day! The nerve!'
Talk to Clotild
Knock on Clotild's door
Lassa's friend Clotild has not shown up for their weekly tea.
Wait for Clotild to answer the door
From within the house, someone shouts, 'Go away!'
Find Clotild's house in Gamwich
Knock on Clotild's door
You should find Clotild's house in Gamwich.\n\nIt is located across from the Brimful Quiver Inn.
